txt.en: 'Some of the Orcs have run into the mountain. We must enter the caves and push them back, far away from the Vale. It is the only way to assure that courage never returns to them. We will enter when you are ready.'
Arvaethor can be found in the town of Ethring in Ringl√≥ Vale.\n\nYou have returned to Ethring and should speak with Arvaethor.
Arvaethor asks for you to accompany him into a cavern under the White Mountains and drive the Orkish forces back.

'This is indeed unsettling. Why are there so many of the Dead inside this mountain? I know the history of the Stone of Erech as much as any Gondorian, but the Paths of the Dead rests many miles and mountain peaks away from here. I have not heard of the Dead travelling so far away from the place that cursed them. We must find answers if we are to deter the Dead from entering the Vale.'
Arvaethor asks for you to accompany him into a cavern under the White Mountains and drive the Orkish forces back.
